- Star Player Spotlight: a grisly profile of Bulla Shardhorn, a pox-ridden beast who can play for Chaos Renegade, and Nurgle teams. Includes his in-game cost, stats and skills, and career highlights;
- Star Player Spotlight: a profile of Tolly Glocklinger, a former circus strongman (which is excellent) who can play for Nurgle teams. Includes his in-game cost, stats and skills, and career highlights;
- The Glittering Prizes: an overview of the recent history of Blood Bowl taking a closer look at many of the minor leagues and tournaments that have sprung up after the collapse of the NAF, becoming regular fixtures;
- Sideline Assistance: a trio of rotten new inducements for Nurgle, Chaos Chosen, and Chaos Renegade Blood Bowl teams. Plague Doctors, Cavorting Nurglings and Horticulturalists of Nurgle are available – none of them do anything especially pleasant…;
- Mighty Blow!: tales of sporting glory from the career of all-time Star Player Bob Bifford, presented as an all-new comic strip drawn by the legendary Blood Bowl illustrator Pete Knifton, and written by official Spike! Journal sports-scribe Nick Kyme.

from the publisher

Name: Someone Has Died: Dirty Deck
Description:
Expansion to the base game with additional very NSFW cards

     7 Identity
     5 Objection
     6 Relationship
     17 Back Story

Name: The Wall
Description: The Wall, based on the television show of the same name, is played with two teams, with each team trying to earn more money than the other by game's end. One player on the team drops balls into different channels of the wall, with the balls ending up in troughs that are worth varying amounts of money. This player's partner attempts to answer trivia questions, without seeing how much money the ball-dropper has earned. After eleven questions, the player behind the wall has to decide whether to accept the guaranteed amount or to take a chance that the sum won through questions is higher.

Name: World of Warcraft Trading Card Game: Scarlet Monastery Dungeon Deck
Description: Players can form a party of three to take on Scarlet Commander Mograine cooperatively. Unlike previous raid decks of World of Warcraft: Trading Card Game, you don't need a pilot for a Dungeon Deck, the deck plays itself by a built-in AI. You can also customize the Dungeon Deck for difficulty and your heroes will level up as you gain experience.

Name: FastAlone
Description:
FastAlone is a collection of board games for one-man play where one play can be played in about five minutes. You can play various games with dice and whiteboard markers.
The rules of the game are five kinds. Every one rule have two patterns of boards. So you can enjoy ten games.
One playing time is short. So you can play with a little free time.
Also, it's not just to enjoy clearing the game. You can compete with other players by score. Please enjoy according to your lifestyle.

Name: The World of SMOG: Rise of Moloch – Arcanist Extras Box
Description:
A kickstarter-exclusive box from the campaign The World of Smog: Rise of Moloch with all stretch goals. That's included:


     8 bonus Gentlemen (like Phileas Fogg, Lady Widow...)
     20 bonus Agents (like Darwin, Omnivorus...),
     Some Other bonus (like Winston, Ciclomaton, 8 ratboys, 10 killer clown cyclers, some missions...).

Name: Koulutusleikkaus
Description:
Koulutusleikkaus ("Education Cutback") is a game about cutbacks in Finnish education system by the current government - against their promises (Koulutuslupaus - education promise) prior to election. Main characters are Prime Minister Juha Sipilä and Minister of Education Sanni Grahn-Laasonen.

Players start with a certain number of students and teachers (wooden bits) which they assign to different schools (from primary to university). During the game, cutback after cutback (different event cards) force players to fire teachers or do some other unpleasant action which leads to student alienation. Players may struggle against the cutbacks (eg. reassign teachers), but eventually they can't save everybody. In the end, the player who lost the least is the winner - or the best loser.
—user summary

Koulutusleikkaus on peli koulutusleikkauksista ja niiden vaikutuksista.
Kukin pelaaja pelaa koulutuksen järjestäjää, joka yrittää saada oppilaitoksensa aina varhaiskasvatuksesta yliopistoon asti selviämään parhaalla mahdollisella tavalla hallituksen tekemistä leikkauksista. 
Tässä pelissä ei ole voittajia, ainoastaan pienempiä ja suurempia häviäjiä. 
Koeta tehdä parhaasi koulutuksen pelastamiseksi! 

    koulutusleikkaus on omistettu koulutukselle ja sen tuomalle taas-arvolle ja kehitykselle, sekä kaikille opettajille, muulle henkilökunnalle ja ennen kaikkea opiskelijoille, jotka ovat kärsineet koulutusleikkauksista. 


—description from the back of the box (Finnish)
